component.name: Accordion
component.description: Collapsible content sections for progressive disclosure of information.

useCases: Multi-step content that benefits from progressive disclosure
Data dashboards with expandable stat details

commonPatterns.name: basic-faq
commonPatterns.description: Simple collapsible list with line variant
commonPatterns.composition:
<Accordion variant="line">
  <AccordionItem value="q1">
    <AccordionTrigger>What is your return policy?</AccordionTrigger>
    <AccordionContent>You can return items within 30 days.</AccordionContent>
  </AccordionItem>
</Accordion>

commonPatterns.name: card-variant
commonPatterns.description: Bordered card-style accordion for settings or grouped content
commonPatterns.composition:
<Accordion variant="card">
  <AccordionItem value="general">
    <AccordionTrigger icon={<Settings />}>General Settings</AccordionTrigger>
    <AccordionContent>Settings content here.</AccordionContent>
  </AccordionItem>
</Accordion>

commonPatterns.name: stat-layout
commonPatterns.description: Trigger with stat layout showing a label above a large data value
commonPatterns.composition:
<Accordion variant="card">
  <AccordionItem value="revenue">
    <AccordionTrigger layout="stat" label="Total Revenue" badge={<Badge>+12%</Badge>}>$48,200</AccordionTrigger>
    <AccordionContent>Revenue breakdown details.</AccordionContent>
  </AccordionItem>
</Accordion>

commonPatterns.name: accordion-group
commonPatterns.description: Grouped accordion with header, footer, and contained styling
commonPatterns.composition:
<AccordionGroup headerTitle="Settings" headerDescription="Manage your preferences" footerAction={<Button variant="primary" size="sm">Save</Button>}>
  <AccordionItem value="notifications">
    <AccordionTrigger>Notifications</AccordionTrigger>
    <AccordionContent>Notification settings here.</AccordionContent>
  </AccordionItem>
</AccordionGroup>

commonPatterns.name: two-column-masonry
commonPatterns.description: Masonry two-column layout for dense FAQ or settings pages
commonPatterns.composition:
<Accordion variant="line" columns={2} masonry>
  <AccordionItem value="a1"><AccordionTrigger>Question A</AccordionTrigger><AccordionContent>Answer A</AccordionContent></AccordionItem>
  <AccordionItem value="a2"><AccordionTrigger>Question B</AccordionTrigger><AccordionContent>Answer B</AccordionContent></AccordionItem>
</Accordion>

antiPatterns.scenario: Using accordion for a single collapsible section
antiPatterns.reason: Accordion implies multiple sections; a single collapsible is better served by a Collapsible or details element
antiPatterns.alternative: Use a Collapsible component or simple show/hide toggle

antiPatterns.scenario: Nesting accordions more than two levels deep
antiPatterns.reason: Deeply nested accordions create cognitive overload and accessibility issues
antiPatterns.alternative: Flatten the information architecture or use tabs for top-level grouping

antiPatterns.scenario: Hiding critical information behind accordion triggers
antiPatterns.reason: Users may miss important content that is collapsed by default
antiPatterns.alternative: Show critical information inline; use accordion only for supplementary details

semanticMeaning.line: Minimal separator-based style for inline content areas
semanticMeaning.card: Bordered card container with background fill
semanticMeaning.contained: Bordered card with elevation shadow for standalone sections

slots.trigger-icon: Optional icon rendered before the trigger label
slots.trigger-subtitle: Secondary text line below the trigger label
slots.trigger-badge: Badge or tag displayed alongside the trigger (stat layout)
slots.content: Arbitrary content rendered inside the collapsible panel

parentConstraints: AccordionItem must be a direct child of Accordion
AccordionTrigger and AccordionContent must be inside AccordionItem

interactions.hover: Trigger text shifts to primary color
interactions.expand: Content slides in from top with fade; chevron rotates 180 degrees
interactions.collapse: Content slides out to top with fade; chevron returns to 0 degrees

responsive.mobile: Single column layout; columns prop ignored below md breakpoint
responsive.desktop: Supports 1 or 2 column grid or masonry layout

accessibility.role: Uses Radix Accordion primitive with proper aria-expanded, aria-controls, and role attributes
accessibility.keyboardSupport: Enter/Space to toggle; Tab to navigate between triggers; Arrow keys for sequential navigation
accessibility.screenReader: Announces expanded/collapsed state, trigger labels, and content regions
accessibility.focusManagement: Visible 2px focus ring on triggers via focus-visible

rules: Always provide a unique value prop for each AccordionItem
Use autoCollapse (default true) for single-expand behavior; set to false for multiple open panels
AccordionGroup provides header/footer chrome around a line-variant accordion
The surface prop (0 or 1) controls background alternation in card/contained variants
Nested accordions automatically indent via depth context

aiHints.context: Use when content needs progressive disclosure in a vertical stack. Prefer line variant for inline content and card/contained for standalone sections. For data dashboards, use layout='stat' on triggers. Use AccordionGroup when the accordion needs a header title and footer actions.
